name: Cyberdroid
overview: A colorful multi-scrolling shooter written in Blitz Basic. Coding by Antonio Ruiz Fernandez. Graphics by Jose Maria Ruiz; rendered gfx by David Diaz Gonzalez. Music by David Diaz Gonzalez and sound FX by Juan Antonio Anillo. It is the year 25730 in the Extraterrestrial Era. The Supreme Sapience Computer suggested the correct rules in evolution for the human being to progress without senseless recessions. The first of these rules could only be: 1: to abandon the biological status. So was the way the first Homo Cyberneticus was born. In a few months thousands of them came to life, these ones being capable to squire in a period of hours conscience, ideas and feelings of, and for a whole life. And they were programmed to protect the living and through them experience generations of wisdom and teaching. But as does happen, resentments and schisms came between the two, and only you can do the work to save the species.
